text: Nayanthara (born Diana Mariam Kurian; 18 November 1984) is an Indian actress and movie producer who works mostly in Tamil, Telugu and Malayalam films. In 2023, Nayanthara did her first Bollywood film through the film Jawan, starring alongside Shahrukh Khan. she is a recipient of Five Filmfare award south. She made her acting debut(first appearance in public) with the Malayalam film Manassinakkare in 2003. She has appeared in more than 80 films. She is also called as the "Lady Superstar" of Indian cinema. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1984 births Category:Indian actors Category:Tamil actors
title: Nayanthara
